actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend for an additional 5 years the provisions of the Energy Tax Act of 1978 which exempt certain alcohol fuels from Federal motor fuels excise taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Tax Act of 1978 to extend from October 1, 1984, to October 1, 1989, the exemption of certain alcohol fuels from Federal motor fuels excise taxes.

titles.title: A bill to extend for an additional 5 years the provisions of the Energy Tax Act of 1978 which exempt certain alcohol fuels from Federal motor fuels excise taxes.
